name: Homebrew32
description:
After being sucked into your PC by a mysterious antivirus, take control of a consciousness-driven 1-5 barreled tank to confront the bugs head-on. Navigate your way through the motherboard, battling boss viruses to unlock new zones. Keep an eye on the 'UPGRADE MACHINE', which bestows upgrades upon either you or your adversaries every 1-10 seconds. Accumulate points from previous runs to enhance the upgrade machine further and gain the upper hand in your fight against the digital threats.



  • 21 Song Radio (Shoutout) DOS - 88 for the amazing music, please check them out!
  • 25 Unique Base Enemies
  • 5 Different Spawn Bosses
  • 10 Main Bosses
  • Player Icon Collectables
  • Mousepad Collectables
  • 3 Different Modes



  • 3 Different Maps
  • 25 Unique Weapons
  • Tons of Unique and Fun Upgrades
  • Unique Top - Down Art Style
  • Dynamic Lighting
  • Custom Probability Algorithm
  • All the Fun Stuff For Sure
